padding-bottom.description: Needed to extend the padding in the Infobox component, ensuring consistent and visually appealing spacing to the right and below the button.

fatal.description: This icon is not yet part of the official icon set. It has to be drawn by F.Gabsa team in Illustrator.

top-left.description: Sets the left upper corner radius to zero because there we have a left colored border and no need for rounded corners.

top-right.description: Rounds the right upper corner to enhance visual appeal of the component.

bottom-left.description: Sets the left upper corner radius to zero because there we have a left colored border and no need for rounded corners.

bottom-right.description: Rounds the right bottom corner to enhance visual appeal of the component.

title.description: The message is in a bold font weight to build visual contrast and emphasize the hierarchy.

body.description: The message is in a medium font weight to build visual contrast and emphasize the hierarchy in case the title is present.

row-gap.description: This is the gap between the main content of the component and the optional button container if visible.

interaction-emphasis.description: We on purpose lower the interaction emphasis of all buttons inside Infobox and use the muted colors defined in semantics/colors/interaction-emphasis/muted. This token can not be used in Figma due to Figma restrictions. In this case, the token is static and does not react to dark/light mode.
